name: Neolumana
description:
Neolumana is a Jump & Run plattformer that uses circular movement as its core gameplay mechanic. A little robot has to move through a futuristic cyberpunk world and collect energy orbs in order to recharge his batteries. Can you make it through the city without running out of time?

Art and sound design were largely neglected. Still we are quite happy with what we came up with in this limited time that we worked on the project. Enjoy!

Controls:

  • WASD for moving
  • SPACE Jump
  • SHIFT hold on to attachment points

by Edward Purwanto and Manuel Wagner
